column5: My place is a working ranch, surrounded by wide open spaces and big Texas skies. It’s close to the Roundtop and Warrenton Antique venues. Guests will have use of a bedroom and a private bath. You will love it because of the glorious views, the comfy beds, the amazing light, the friendly kitchen, the high ceilings. For history enthusiasts, there are also some charming old buildings on the property. AND you’ll love my lovely white Brahman cows.
column8: BlackWalnut Hill Ranch--in the Heart of Texas
